original_text:
Defenders of the Realm
Una slot che utilizza un’ambientazione fantasy è sempre una garanzia per quel che riguarda l’aspetto grafico e il coinvolgimento del giocatore. Defenders of the Realm fonde la tradizione norrena con quella epica. La storia è semplice: 4 guerrieri sono impegnati a difendere la città contro le forze del male utilizzando i loro poteri ma anche armi speciali, come il famoso martello di Thor o la spada di Excalibur. La griglia di gioco è rappresentata dalla facciata di un altare, con le effigi dei protagonisti poste sulla parte superiore e sullo sfondo una città dalle linee futuristiche ma con richiami tipici dell’architettura araba. Il comparto sonoro è composto da una musica incalzante ma non invadente, che si accompagna a qualche animazione grafica collegata alle vincite. I tasti Play e Autoplay si trovano sulla sinistra, in basso si può impostare il livello della scommessa e attraverso il tasto «+» si accede al menù.
Caratteristiche di Defenders of the Realm
La griglia è una semplice 5×4, con 20 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata minima è fissata a 0,20 €, la massima a 200 €. Si può decidere di impostare un numero variabile di giri automatici e nel caso scegliere alcuni limiti di giocata. La volatilità è alta, si vince meno di frequente ma sempre ottime somme. RTP nella norma pari al 96%.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli regolari sono 9. Le carte 5, J, Q, K e A scolpite in monili di roccia hanno un basso valore. I simboli più remunerativi sono i 4 guerrieri, con quelli norreni con una quota più alta rispetto a quelli epici.
La scritta Wild davanti a una porta semichiusa è il nostro Jolly, è pagante e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali.
Lo Scatter è invece lo scrigno, se ne compaiono 3 o più, allora si attiverà il Pick Bonus, un gioco speciale multilivello. In pratica ci troveremo davanti a diverse file contenenti dei simboli coperti. Noi dovremo cliccarci sopra e scoprire la tipologia di ricompensa:

Il blu corrisponde a una vincita variabile
Il verde corrisponde a una vincita e ci fa avanzare di livello

Quando arriviamo all’ultimo livello potremmo trovare la X e allora il gioco si concluderà immediatamente, oppure svelare il simbolo 2x e allora vedremo raddoppiare tutte le vincite.
Le sorprese però non finiscono qui, perché in Defenders of the Realm c’è anche una funzione chiamata Beat Boxes. In pratica, ogni volta che in una posizione compare il corno, allora questa verrà incorniciata con un colore che rimarrà anche nei giri successivi. In caso di una combinazione vincente, la somma verrà raddoppiata e la cornice sparirà.
Se le cornici appariranno allineate su tutti i rulli, allora si avrà la funzione Locked Wilds: 10 giri gratuiti durante i quali apparirà un Wild esteso, a volte anche con un moltiplicatore 2x.

raw_translation.response:
Defenders of the Realm

As an experienced gambler, one can always expect a visually stunning and engaging experience when it comes to a slot game set in a fantasy world. Defenders of the Realm seamlessly merges Nordic traditions with the epic. The story revolves around four warriors who use their special powers and weapons, such as Thor's hammer and Excalibur, to defend the city against the forces of evil. The game board is represented by an altar façade, with the protagonists' effigies placed on top and a city in the background with futuristic lines but also typical references to Arabic architecture. The sound effects are accompanied by an intense and invigorating music, which is not intrusive but complements some of the graphical animations. The play and autoplay buttons are located on the left, while the betting level can be set on the bottom and the menu can be accessed through the "+" sign.

Features of Defenders of the Realm

The board is a simple 5x4 with 20 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is €0.20 and the maximum is €200. One can decide to set a variable number of automatic spins and choose some playing limits. The volatility is high, with less frequent but still great wins. The RTP is within the norm, equal to 96%.

Symbols and functionalities

There are nine regular symbols. The cards, 5, J, Q, K, and A, carved in rock jewels, have low values. The most rewarding symbols are the four warriors, with the Nordic ones having higher rewards than the epic ones.

The word Wild in front of a half-closed door is our wild card, which pays and replaces all other symbols except the special ones.

The scatter, on the other hand, is a chest. If three or more appear, the Pick Bonus will be activated, a special multilevel game. Essentially, we will be faced with different rows containing covered symbols. We will have to click on them and discover the type of reward:

- Blue corresponds to a variable payout.
- Green corresponds to a payout and allows us to advance to a new level.

When we reach the last level, we may encounter the X, which will immediately end the game, or reveal the 2x symbol, doubling all payouts.

The surprises, however, do not end here, as Defenders of the Realm also features a function called Beat Boxes. Essentially, each time a horn appears in a position, it will be framed with a color that will remain in subsequent spins. If a winning combination occurs, the payout will be doubled, and the frame will disappear.

If the frames are aligned on all reels, the Locked Wilds feature will be activated: 10 free spins during which an extended wild card will appear, sometimes with a 2x multiplier.

Variable automatic spins can be set, and some betting limits can also be determined if preferred. The game is highly volatile, with less frequent but significant wins. The RTP is in the standard range at 96%.

Symbols and Features

There are nine regular symbols, with the 5, J, Q, K, and A cards carved in rock jewelry representing the lower values. The higher paying symbols are the four warriors, with the Norse ones having a higher percentage than the epic ones.

The word Wild in front of a half-closed door is the game's wild card, paying out and substituting all the other symbols except the specials. The Scatter is instead the chest. If three or more appear, the Pick Bonus is activated, which is a multi-level special game. In practice, there will be various rows containing hidden symbols that we should click on to reveal a prize type:

- Blue corresponds to a variable win.
- Green corresponds to a win and moves us to the next level.

Once we reach the last level, we might find the X, which ends the game immediately, or reveal the 2x symbol, doubling all the wins.

Defenders of the Realm also has another bonus game called Beat Boxes. Whenever a horn appears in a position, it will be framed with a color that will remain unchanged in the following spins. In the case of a winning combination, the sum is doubled, and the frame disappears.

If the frames align along all the reels, then the Locked Wilds feature grants ten free spins during which the Wild is extended, sometimes with a 2x multiplier too.

Overall, Defenders of the Realm offers an exciting experience, perfect for experienced gamblers looking for a fantasy-inspired game with excellent graphics and features.

As an experienced gambler, one can always expect a visually stunning and engaging experience when it comes to a slot game set in a fantasy world. Defenders of the Realm seamlessly merges Nordic traditions with the epic. The story revolves around four warriors who use their special powers and weapons, such as Thor's hammer and Excalibur, to defend the city against the forces of evil. The game board is represented by an altar façade, with the protagonists' effigies placed on top and a city in the background with futuristic lines but also typical references to Arabic architecture. The sound effects are accompanied by an intense and invigorating music, which is not intrusive but complements some of the graphical animations. The play and autoplay buttons are located on the left, while the betting level can be set on the bottom and the menu can be accessed through the "+" sign.

Features of Defenders of the Realm

The board is a simple 5x4 with 20 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is €0.20 and the maximum is €200. One can decide to set a variable number of automatic spins and choose some playing limits. The volatility is high, with less frequent but still great wins. The RTP is within the norm, equal to 96%.

Symbols and functionalities

There are nine regular symbols. The cards, 5, J, Q, K, and A, carved in rock jewels, have low values. The most rewarding symbols are the four warriors, with the Nordic ones having higher rewards than the epic ones.

The word Wild in front of a half-closed door is our wild card, which pays and replaces all other symbols except the special ones.

The scatter, on the other hand, is a chest. If three or more appear, the Pick Bonus will be activated, a special multilevel game. Essentially, we will be faced with different rows containing covered symbols. We will have to click on them and discover the type of reward:

- Blue corresponds to a variable payout.
- Green corresponds to a payout and allows us to advance to a new level.

When we reach the last level, we may encounter the X, which will immediately end the game, or reveal the 2x symbol, doubling all payouts.

The surprises, however, do not end here, as Defenders of the Realm also features a function called Beat Boxes. Essentially, each time a horn appears in a position, it will be framed with a color that will remain in subsequent spins. If a winning combination occurs, the payout will be doubled, and the frame will disappear.

If the frames are aligned on all reels, the Locked Wilds feature will be activated: 10 free spins during which an extended wild card will appear, sometimes with a 2x multiplier.

response.headline: The Bonus Games: Double the Fun, Double the Wins!
response.content:
Are you looking for a slot game with epic bonus games that will keep you on your toes? Look no further than Defenders of the Realm! This game's Pick Bonus is a special multilevel game that adds excitement and rewards to your gameplay.

Picture this: you're faced with different rows containing covered symbols. It's like a game of roulette, but without all the math. You'll have to click on the symbols to reveal the type of reward they hold: blue symbols correspond to a variable payout, while green symbols correspond to a payout plus a chance to advance to the next level.

But beware of the dreaded X! It could appear at any moment and end the game immediately, leaving you with nothing but sweet, sweet disappointment. Unless, of course, you reveal the 2x symbol, which doubles all payouts. Double the fun, double the wins - now we're talking!

So if you want to experience an exhilarating bonus game that will have you at the edge of your seat, give Defenders of the Realm a spin. Just make sure to keep it together when you hit the jackpot - we don't want you to embarrass yourself in front of your pets or children.
